props.active: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component
props.activeClass: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. You can find more information about the [**active-class** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#active-class) on the vue-router documentation.
props.activeColor: The applied color when a `v-list-item` is in an active state
props.appendAvatar: Appends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component to the header
props.appendIcon: Appends a [v-icon](/components/icons/) component to the header
props.color: Applies specified color to the control when in an **active** state or **input-value** is **true** - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`)
props.contained: Changes the component style by changing how color is applied to the background.
props.prependAvatar: Prepends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component to the header
props.prependIcon: Prepends a [v-icon](/components/icons/) component to the header
props.title: Generates a `v-list-item-title` component with the supplied value
props.subtitle: Generates a `v-list-item-subtitle` component with the supplied value
props.value: The value used when a child of a [v-list-item-group](/components/list-item-groups).
